overview: Combining fiction and documentary, there is a saying in the pioneering history of the western United States: "For every mile of railway built, one Chinese migrant worker died." There are also military garrisons in towns along the way, isolating the Indians.
tagline: Combining fiction and documentary, there is a saying in the pioneering history of the western United States: "For every mile of railway built, one Chinese migrant worker died."
title: 年去年来
